title: The Silk Code
description: Winner Locus Award for Best First Science Fiction novel of 1999.#Rita Ora used The Silk Code in her November 2016 video promo for Tzenenis.#Phil D'Amato, a New York City forensic detective (also featured in several of Levinson's popular short stories and two subsequent novels), is caught in an ongoing struggle that dates all the way back to the dawn of humanity on Earth--and one of his best friends is a recent casualty. Unless Phil can unravel the genetic puzzle of the Silk Code, he'll soon be just as dead.
author: Paul Levinson
